name: Neowin Atlas 100% Width
description: Exapands Neowin.net Atlas to full width.
additional_info:
/* +++ changelog +++
February 5, 2010
 - original release
*/

Note: I'd recommend you install http://userstyles.org/styles/42696 too so there is no horizontal scroll bar on the Neowin.net Forums.

Or Change "width: auto" to "width: 97%".
